QuestData.Title: The Voice of Iyu
QuestData.Description: The botani and their wretched minions take and take and take.$b$bThey want food, they take our land. They want an army, they take our people.$b$bIt is important to strike fear into the shrubby hearts of these plant people.$b$BLook for their leader, the Voice of Iyu. It is a botani who speaks on behalf of their genesaur master.$b$bKill their precious leader in the safety of his precious bloom.
QuestData.RewardText: It isn't enough to kill the botani. They will always have greater numbers.$b$bYou must cut them deep and hard, where it hurts them the most.$b$bLike slaying their most sacred leader.
